annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 5202(b) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-486, August 2, 2004, 51 DCR 8236).
For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 5202(b) of Fiscal Year 2005 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2004 (D.C. Act 15-594, October 26, 2004, 51 DCR 11725).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Subsequent to the repeal of this section, D.C. Law 15-354, § 73(e), purported to amend subsecs. (a) and (b), therefore, the amendment was not effective.
